md:
giải nghĩa từ "fortunate" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

fortunate (adjective)

* Meaning: having good luck or a favorable outcome
* Vietnamese: may mắn, hạnh phúc

Example sentence: She was fortunate to have escaped the accident without injury.

* Related words: luck, chance, fate, prosperity

fortunate (noun)

* Meaning: a person who is lucky or successful
* Vietnamese: người may mắn, người hạnh phúc

Example sentence: He was a fortunate businessman who made a fortune in real estate.

* Related words: winner, success, prosperity, good fortune
